item.title: Enhancing Cyber Security Resilience: Change Management in an Evolving Landscape
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Cyber Security" , "Change Management" , "Resilience" , "IT Infrastructure" , "Risk Assessment" , "Compliance" , "Incident Response" , "Best Practices" , "ITIL" , "Security Controls"
item.description: Discover the importance of change management in cyber security and learn how to enhance resilience in today's evolving threat landscape.

item.title: Getting Started with Terraform for Infrastructure as Code
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Terraform" , "Infrastructure as Code" , "IaC" , "Cloud Computing" , "DevOps" , "Automation" , "AWS" , "Azure" , "Google Cloud" , "Cloud Providers" , "Configuration Management" , "Deployment" , "Provisioning" , "Resource Management" , "Scalability" , "Resilience" , "Security" , "Compliance" , "Best Practices"
item.description: Learn the basics of Terraform, a popular infrastructure as code tool, and how to use it to manage infrastructure efficiently.
